text: I have a real passion for many aspects of home lifestyle and beauty.
author: Rachel Roy

text: The more people explore the world, the more they realize in every country there's a different aesthetic. Beauty really is in the eye of the beholder.
author: Helena Christensen

text: There will always be a desire for something new, fresh and innovative, as well as a yearning and respect for timeless elegance and beauty.
author: Helena Christensen

text: The difference between utility and utility plus beauty is the difference between telephone wires and the spider web.
author: Edwin Way Teale

text: I felt I had to share Idaho with my friend from New York because he'd shared New York with me, so I was going to share the beauty of nature with a man who went to museums and clubs late at night. But there was nothing to do where I lived at night.
author: Mariel Hemingway
